    • Method Detail

      • fileExist

        java.lang.Boolean fileExist(java.lang.String strFileName)
        Accept a full file path and name and determine if it exists on disk. If it does, return a true. If it does not exist, return a false.
        Parameters:
        strFileName - -
        Returns:

      • getFromFile

        java.lang.String getFromFile(java.lang.String strFileName)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        * Accept a full file path and name as a parameter and check to see if it exists using the fileExists method. If it does exist, read the file from disk and return the contents as a string. If the file does not exist, return a null.
        Parameters:
        strFileName - - a full file path and name
        Returns:
        - Contents from the file as a string.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getPREData

        java.lang.String getPREData(java.lang.String strPage)
        Accept an HTML web page as a string and extract the data that is between the PRE tags using the getRegEx function. If nothing is found, return a null.
        Parameters:
        strPage - - a normal HTML page as a string
        Returns:
        - Extracted Contents - only the data between two PRE tags or null.

      • getRegEx

        java.lang.String getRegEx(java.lang.String strInput,
                          java.lang.String strPattern)
        Extract a small string from a larger one using a Regular Expression and the pattern specified as a parameter. If nothing is found, return a null.
        Parameters:
        strInput - - large string
        strPattern - - formatted Regular Expression
        Returns:
        - a small string that is the result of the Reg Ex search

      • getURLRaw

        java.lang.String getURLRaw(java.lang.String strURL)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Accept a string URL, create a string using the StringBuilder class and return it as one long string. If the page does not exist, return a null.
        Parameters:
        strURL - - URL as a string
        Returns:
        - the entire web page as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • properCase

        java.lang.String properCase(java.lang.String strInput)
        Accept a string and convert the whole string into lower case then upper case only the first letter of each word.
        Parameters:
        strInput - - string to be converted
        Returns:
        - string with every word's first letter capitalized

      • saveToFile

        void saveToFile(java.lang.String strFileName,
                java.lang.String strContent)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Accept a string and save it to a local file
        Parameters:
        strFileName - - a full file path and name.
        strContent - - string to be saved to disk.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
